info.author: Bernhard Biskup
info.description:
**This is alpha software. Use with caution**

*araldo* provides a simple, extensible communication relay (based on `gevent <http://www.gevent.org/>`_ and `WebSockets <http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WebSocket>`_) between multiple endpoints

Resources:

- `Repository and issue tracker: <http://bitbucket.org/ganymed/araldo>`_
- `Documentation of in-development version <https://araldo.readthedocs.org/en/latest/>`_

Plugins:

- `araldo-redis <http://bitbucket.org/ganymed/araldo-redis>`_
- `araldo-websocket <http://bitbucket.org/ganymed/araldo-websocket>`_
info.keywords: websockets pubsub publish subscribe message queue push notification
info.name: araldo
info.summary: Message-oriented communication relay for pluggable backends
